'''Yumemiru "Juunen" Street Lamp''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Yumemiru "Juunen" Street Lamp is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
